basicInfo.name: Cleo
basicInfo.flavor: Living deep within Dragon Ruins, the gorgon Cleo got her nickname \"Gaze of Destruction\" by turning people into stone if they crossed her.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Deadly Poison
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 25% Physical Attack Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Petrifying Gaze
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Petrify chance becomes 60%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 85% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Gorgon's Gaze
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Silence Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Silence Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 31% Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story: Living deep within Dragon Ruins, the gorgon Cleo got her nickname \"Gaze of Destruction\" by turning people into stone if they crossed her.

basicInfo.name: Cleo
basicInfo.flavor: After becoming a monster, Cleo went into hiding deep inside the Dragon Ruins. She has grown to hate humans because they're always trying to steal her petrifying powers.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Deadly Poison
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 110% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Petrifying Gaze
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 110% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Gorgon's Gaze
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Silence Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Silence Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

profile.story: A gorgon living in Dragon Ruins that's declared herself the queen of the lamia.\nShe also believes that she is a descendant of noble dragons, which, to her, is exemplified by her scales and tail: her pride and joy.\nOne day, a grim reaper-like figure showed up and promised her that she would be granted great power if she attacked the human and elf settlements near Dragon Ruins, so she started a war against them.

basicInfo.name: Cleo
basicInfo.flavor: Cleo was once a beautiful woman who lived in the Dragon Ruins. However, Athena cursed her and turned her into a hideous monster for reasons unknown.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Deadly Poison
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 65% chance to inflict Poison. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 100% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Petrifying Gaze
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 100% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Gorgon's Gaze
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Silence Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Silence Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

profile.story: A gorgon living in Dragon Ruins that's declared herself the queen of the lamia.\nShe also believes that she is a descendant of noble dragons, which, to her, is exemplified by her scales and tail: her pride and joy.\nOne day, a grim reaper-like figure showed up and promised her that she would be granted great power if she attacked the human and elf settlements near Dragon Ruins, so she started a war against them.
